## ctx variable

Shared mutable state of the current build operation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
ctx: {
    fetches: Map<string, Promise<void>>;
    retries: Map<string, number>;
    probes: Map<string, Promise<ContentInfo>>;
    encodes: Map<string, Promise<void>>;
}
```
